title: Do we have a Loading screen border reward for 5v5s ranked team ?
body: Hey just wondering do we have a Loading screen border / icons reward for 5v5s ranked team ?

replies.body:
Assuming it was your highest rank, above silver, and you played at least 10 games with that team, you will see the border in normals and get the icon (if above gold you'll get the Maokai as well). 

Not totally sure if it will show in flex, last I heard Riot were still deciding where to show each border ranked queue wise. I would imagine you would see it in flex queue but not in solo/duo when it releases, however without new information that is the best I can give you.
I just want to know when we can receive the rewards? cuz solo/duo rewards is already given. cheers.
Usually, up to two weeks from the start of the rollout (i.e this morning).
